title: Petersburg National Battlefield: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather       Winters can be a bit extreme in south central Virginia. Temperatures are often below freezing in January and February so visitors are encouraged to dress appropriately. Spring and fall are fairly mild, however, jackets are encouraged. Summers are often hot and humid with heat indexes often topping 100 degrees. Visitors are encouraged to bring lots of water and to use sunblock.
